items.name: Inferno, Part the First: Strike the Match
Inferno, Part the Second: Fan the Flame

wiki.powers: Able to refract most forms of energy directed at him, including ambient light
wiki.bio_text: The mutant known only as Prism is a member of the superhuman assassins the [[Marauders (mutants)|Marauders]] who were apparently all killed during a demonic invasion of New York City but subsequently cloned from samples of their DNA by their founder, geneticist [[Sinister|Mister Sinister]]. Prism possesses a body made of an unknown multi-faceted crystalline substance that can be shattered if enough force is applied. This limitation may explain why Prism has accompanied the Marauders on only two known occasions - first during the [[Mutant Massacre|massacre of the underground mutant community]] the [[Morlocks]], and second when sent to recover Sinister's servant [[Threnody]] and opposed by the [[X-Men]]. Recently, Prism was killed and eaten by [[Predator X]].
